name: The Walls Know You
description:
The Walls Know You is a game(/Twilight Mirage OC generator) made for Secret Samol 2022 for Drawn-from-the-ground on tumblr, who asked for Signet in Belgard's cockpit. It's a fangame for the Twilight Mirage season of Friends at the Table.
Sorry it's soooooo late, this one got away from me a bit!

This game was made with Twine. It uses this public domain arm reliquary from the Met's collection.
